description:
Ten years after the start of the Meiji Era, a Rurouni wanders into Tokyo to find a new life with his new friends. Vowing never to kill, he tries to escape his fate as the greatest killer of the Edo dynasty.
An old menace threatens the new Meiji Era, the villian is http://anidb.net/ch6584 [Shishio Makoto], the successor to the Hitokiri Battousai who was supposed to have died in the Boshin Wars. Shishio and his Juppon Gatana are ready to start a new revolution to correct the wrong doings of the Meiji Government and also to avoid colonization.

REGULAR.description:
A mysterious wanderer known as Kenshin is taken at the Kamiya Kasshin Dojo, a martial arts school run by a young woman named Kaoru.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Densetsu no Bikenshi... Ai Yue ni Tatakau Otoko
Yakışıklı Kılıç Ustası Efsanesi / Aşkı İçin Savaşan Bir Adam
ตำนานนักรบซามูไร การต่อสู้เพื่อความรัก
伝説の美剣士... 愛ゆえに闘う男

REGULAR.description:
Following an encounter with a young pickpocket named Yahiko, Kaoru risks her own freedom to gain his from some local gangsters.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gaki-zamurai Sutta! Mon Da! de Monkasei
Genç Samuray / Büyük Bir Zorluk ve Yeni Bir Öğrenci
ลูกศิษย์นักล้วงกระเป๋า
ガキ侍 スッた!モンだ!で門下生

REGULAR.description:
After reining in some renegade police officers, Kenshin is recognized as the Samurai whose bravery helped establish the Meiji Era and is asked to rejoin the army.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Celui qui a effacé le passé
Kanashimi no Kenshi: Kako o Kiru Otoko
Kederli Kılıç Ustası / Geçmişini Silen Adam
O Homem que Matou o Passado
ดาบอำมหิตจิตใจอ่อน
哀しみの剣士・過去を斬る男

REGULAR.description:
Gohei enlists a vicious street-fighter known as Sanosuke to seek revenge against Kenshin. And even though Kenshin exposes Gohei`s plan, Sanosuke makes it clear that the two of them will fight each other one day.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aku no Ichimonji: Kenkaya Sanosuke Toujou!
ซาโนะสุเกะนักสู้ข้างถนน
悪の一文字・ケンカ屋左之助登場!

REGULAR.description:
After accepting Sanosuke`s challenge, Kenshin encourages him to release his anger towards the corrupt Royalist forces.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sakabatou tai Zanbatou: Tatakai no Hate ni!
Ters Tarafı Keskin Kılıç ve Zanbatou Karşı Karşıya / Savaştan Ötesi
The Reversed-Blade Sword vs. The Zanbatou
การประลองฝีมือริมฝั่งน้ำ
逆刃刀対斬馬刀・闘いの果てに!

REGULAR.description:
With a ruthless ex-Samurai killing high ranking politicians, the Chief of Police asks Kenshin to catch him. But as Kenshin confronts the deadly Jin-nai Udo, Kaoru`s efforts to stop the battle end with her kidnapping.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kurogasa`nın Ortaya Çıkışı / Gölgelerin İçinden Gelen Ziyaretçiler
O Visitante Que Veio da Escuridão
Yami kara no Houmonsha: Kurogasa Arawaru!
ผู้มาเยือนจากความมืด
闇からの訪問者・黒笠現る!

REGULAR.description:
After kidnapping Kaoru, the ruthless Jin-nai Udo draws Kenshin into the fight he`s been seeking for years. Though Kenshin tries to resist, Jin-nai`s powerful spell over Kaoru leaves him no other choice.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ay Işığı Altında Ölümcül Karşılaşma / Sevdiğin İnsanı Koru
Gekka no Shitou: Ai Suru Hito o Mamore!
ผลจาการช่วยคนรัก
月下の死闘・愛する人を守れ!

REGULAR.description:
When local gangsters threaten the life of a beautiful woman, Kenshin and Sanosuke step in to save her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aratanaru Tatakai! Tobikonde Kita Nazo no Bijo
Yeni Bir Savaş! Nereden Geldiği Bilinmeyen Gizemli Güzel
การต่อสู้ที่ดุเดือด
新たなる戦い! 飛び込んできた謎の美女

REGULAR.description:
Though her medical knowledge has saved Yahiko`s life, Sansosuke suspects Megumi of producing the opium responsible for a close friend`s death.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: En Güçlü Ninja Grubu / Korkunç Oniwaban Grubu
Saikyou no Shinobi Gundan: Kyoufu no Oniwabanshu!
จอมพลังโอนิวะบังชู ชิกิโจ
最強の忍び軍団・恐怖の御庭番衆!

REGULAR.description:
Having pledged to save Megumi, the Peace Force must first take on a band of ruthless drug dealing mobsters. But when a rift inside the gang leads to a change in leadership, Kenshin must confront a fighter whose powers he`s underestimated.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aoshi: Utsukushi Sugiru Hodo Kowai Yatsu
ดาวรร้ายที่เต็มไปด้วยเขี้ยวเล็บ
蒼紫・美しすぎるほど怖い奴

REGULAR.description:
Kenshin defeats a local mob`s most powerful fighter, only to then face a gang leader who`s determined to spread powerful new guns across Japan.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: En Güçlü Adama Veda / Işık ve Gölgenin Çarpışması
O Confronto Entre a Luz e a Escuridão
Saraba Saikyou no Otoko-tachi! Hikari to Yami no Gekitotsu
ฝ่ายธรรมะย่อมชนะอธรม
さらば最強の男たち! 光と闇の激突

REGULAR.description:
When a criminal gang threatens a young girl he loves, Yahiko seeks Kenshin`s advice on how to defend her in a lopsided fight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Genç Bir Kılıç Ustasının Doğuşu: İlk Çırak Yahiko`nun Savaşı
Shounen Kenshi Tanjou! Ichiban Deshi Yahiko no Tatakai
The Birth of a Boy Swordsman
การต่อสู้ของศิษย์คนแรก
少年剣士誕生! 一番弟子弥彦の戦い

REGULAR.description:
After jealous harassment forces an aspiring young man out of a sumo wrestling school, Kaoru steps in to take over his training.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Büyük Şampiyona Mücadelesi / Toramaru`nun Sumo Savaşı!
Mezase Yokozuna! Toramaru no Dosukoi Funsenki
พลังอันยิ่งใหญ่ของโทระมารู
めざせ横綱! 虎丸のどすこい奮戦記

REGULAR.description:
After a shady faith healer discredits her medical skills, Megumi`s patients abandon her. And once a worried family panics and pays the phony shaman to heal their sick daughter, Megumi must intervene in order to save the young girl`s life.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chiisana Inochi o Sukue! Bijin Joi: Megumi no Chousen
Küçük Bir Yaşamı Kurtarmak / Kurtarıcı Doktor Megumi
คุณหมอคนสวยกับคำท้าทายที่ไม่พึงปรารรถนา
小さな命を救え! 美人女医・恵の挑戦

REGULAR.description:
A group radicals intent on assassinating political leaders attempt to recruit a local teacher into their cause. After finding that Heihachiro is a former foe who`s now dedicated his life to helping children, Kenshin steps in to repel the assassins.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Honoo no Ansatsu Shuudan, Jinpuu Tai Hashiru!
İki Efsane Katil / İki Efsane İşkenceci
ไล่ล่าเอามาเป็นพวก
炎の暗殺集団, 神風隊走る!

REGULAR.description:
After saving Heihachiro`s life, Kenshin sets out to stop the teacher`s misguided former student from being used as a pawn in a game of political corruption.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yuuki Aru Chikai! Moeyo Hiken: Shiden no Tachi
İçten Bir Vaat: Shiden`in Gizli Kılıç Tekniği
ทำดีย่อมได้ดีทำชั่วย่อมได้รับผลกรรม
勇気ある誓い! 燃えよ秘剣・紫電の太刀

REGULAR.description:
Samurai X protects a circus ringmaster and his talented human cannonball daughter from the threats of a jealous competitor.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hayallerine Doğru Uç / İnsan Topu Marimo
Yume ni Mukatte Tobe! Houdan Musume Marimo no Bouken
จงบินไปตามความฝันเถอะสาวน้อยเมอริโม
夢に向かって飛べ! 砲弾娘マリモの冒険

REGULAR.description:
After stopping a restaurant robbery, Yahiko`s boastfulness lands him in trouble with Kenshin`s old foe, Gohei Hiruma. And once Yahiko agrees to a fight, Gohei uses the opportunity to steal Samurai X`s Reverse Edged Sword.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Koş Yahiko! Ters Tarafı Keskin Kılıcı Ele Geçir
Yahiko et l`épée à lame inversée
วิ่งเข้ายาฮิโกะ รีบไปตามเอาดาบสลับคมคืนมา
走れ! 弥彦・逆刃刀を取り返せ!

REGULAR.description:
While on vacation at the home of Dr. Gensai`s niece, Kenshin and company attracts the attention of a wealthy but arrogant boy who wants to learn the art of swordfighting.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Raijuuta no Yabou: Kinjirareta Oukoku no Gensou
ท่านไรจูดะต้องการสร้างเมืองใหม่
雷十太の野望・禁じられた王国の幻想

REGULAR.description:
Though Kenshin tries to warn him of the bad influence, Yutaro continues to believe in Raijuta, unaware that the renegade is using him plot his revolution. So, when he`s told that the government is out to stop him, Yutaro sneaks away to warn Raijuta.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shinko Ryuu no Fukkatsu! Arashi o Yobu Kyuukyoku no Satsujin Ken
Shinko Stilinin Yeniden Doğuşu / Ölümcül Kılıç – Shinko Stilinin – Yeniden Doğuşu
การประทะกับชินโกริวซึ่งมีพลังมหาศาล
真古流の復活! 嵐を呼ぶ究極の殺人剣

REGULAR.description:
After learning the truth behind Raijuta`s duplicitous plan, an injury sidelines Yutaro, leaving Kenshin to fight the renegade Samurai alone.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akumu no Houkai! Raijuuta no Yabou: Kanketsuhen
Bir Kabusun Dağılışı / Bir Kabusun Yok Oluşu
ไรจูดะอาละวาดใครจะเอาอยู่
悪夢の崩壊! 雷十太の野望・完結編

REGULAR.description:
During a train trip to Yokohama, Kenshin and his friends must save a wealthy English passenger from being robbed by thieves
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaçış Lokomotifindeki Tehlike / Kaçış Lokomotifindeki Sürpriz Olay
初乗り! 暴走陸蒸気びっくり大事件

REGULAR.description:
An artist`s work leads Sanosuke to a reunion with an old army comrade, Tsukioka. But when his old friend wants him to join in avenging the death of their former leader, Sanosuke must stop him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sanosuke no Uragiri!? Unmei no Saikai
ซาโนะสุเกะกับภาพพิมพิ์
左之助の裏切り!? 運命の再会

REGULAR.description:
Following a lavish party at the dojo, Sanosuke can no longer resist joining his old army troop`s plot to punish the government. However, in an effort to stop them, Kenshin is forced to take on Sanosuke
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gece Yarısı Savaşı: Kenshin, Yeniden Sanosuke`ye Karşı
Mayonaka no Tatakai! Sanosuke tai Kenshin Futatabi
ความในใจของซาโนะ
真夜中の戦い! 左之助対剣心ふたたび

REGULAR.description:
In order to earn money for their dojo, the Peace Force signs on to help protect a merchant ship from pirates. However, to keep Kaoru from falling into the hands of the pirate`s female leader, Shura, Kenshin offers himself in exchange.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kızıl Korsan / Kırmızı Korsan – Kenshin ve Kaoru Ayrılıyor
Shinku no Kaizoku: Hikisakareta Kenshin to Kaoru!
โจรสลัดกระหายเลือดเคนชินกับคาโอรุถูกพรากจากกัน
真紅の海賊・引き裂かれた剣心と薫!

REGULAR.description:
After Kenshin`s kidnapping, a bond begins to develop between him and Shura. However, while Shura is confident in the loyalty of her crew, the profits to be made from dealing opium draws them into a mutinous plan.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Inazuma no Keshin! Hokoritakaki Nazo no Onna Kaizoku, Shura
Yıldırımın Vücut Bulmuş Hali / Shura, Gizemli Kadın Korsan
โจรสลัดสาวผู้หยิ่งในศักดิ์ศรีชูรา
稲妻の化身! 誇り高き謎の女海賊, 朱羅

REGULAR.description:
After her trusted colleagues betray Shura, it`s left up to Kenshin to save her life and stop the pirate`s opium smuggling scheme.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Moeagaru Senritsu no Shima! Shinku no Kaizoku: Kanketsuhen
เกาะที่ลุกเป็นไฟ โจรสลัดกระหายเลือดตอนจบ
燃え上がる戦慄の島! 真紅の海賊・完結編

REGULAR.description:
A persistent nightmare comes true when Kenshin`s old enemy, the former leader of a shadowy anti-Royalist organization, is hired to assassinate him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aratanaru Kessen e no Jokyoku: Semarikuru Ookami no Kage!
Dövüşe Sayılı Günler Kala: Kurdun Gölgesi Yaklaşıyor
การนองเลือดครั้งใหม่หมาป่าแห่งมิบุปรากฎตัว
新たなる血戦への序曲・迫り来る狼の影!

REGULAR.description:
Saito sets a trap for Samurai X by enlisting another assassin in his plan. And once Kenshin repels the accomplice, he`s left to take on his old rival.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Geçmişten Gelen Güçlü Rakip: Acımasız Dişlerin Saldırısı!
Shijou Saikyou no Shukuteki! Osoikakaru Hijou no Kiba
The Strongest Opponent From the Past
ศัตรูผู้แข็งเกร่งหมาป่าอหังการ์
史上最強の宿敵! 襲いかかる非情の牙

REGULAR.description:
After stopping a fatal battle with Hajime Saito, a top government official asks Kenshin`s help in killing a shadowy assassin who`s threatening the future of the regime.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fukushuu no Akki: Shishio Makoto no Bouryaku
İntikam Almaya Gelen Şeytan: Makoto Shishio`nun Oyunu
แผนแก้แค้นของปีศาจร้ายชิชิโอะ มาโคโตะ
復讐の悪鬼・志々雄真実の謀略

REGULAR.description:
While preparing to give his decision on helping to kill Shishio, Kenshin learns of the Home Minister`s murder.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yerine Gelmeyen Bir Dilek: Kenshin Ayrılıyor
ความในใจที่ส่งไปไม่ถึง จำใจจาก
届かぬ想い...... 剣心の旅立ち!

REGULAR.description:
Following Kenshin`s departure from the dojo, everyone, and especially Kaoru, are sad at being left behind. And while Saito tries to dissuade Sanosuke from following him, Megumi sends Kaoru to deliver some medicine that will aid in Kenshin`s fight
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Göz Yaşını Cesarete Dönüştür: Kaoru Kamiya`nın Seçimi
Namida o Yuuki ni Kaete! Kamiya Kaoru ga Eranda Michi
เปลี่ยนน้ำตาให้เป็นความกล้า ทางเลือกของคามิยะ คาโอรุ
涙を勇気にかえて! 神谷薫が選んだ道

REGULAR.description:
In the wake of Samurai X`s departure, everyone at the dojo is anxious to join the battle against Shishio. With Sanosuke, Kaoru and Yahiko in pursuit, Kenshin encounters Misao, a young girl who also happens to be a clever thief.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: En Güçlü Olarak Anılmak İçin: Aoshi`nin Yeni Çatışması
Saikyou no Shougou o Tsukamu made! Aoshi no Aratanaru Tatakai
最強の称号を掴むまで! 蒼紫の新たなる闘い

REGULAR.description:
After befriending Misao, Kenshin insists that she return the money she`s stolen before letting her accompany him on his quest to stop Shishio.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eşkıya Kız: Misao Makimachi`nin Gizli Tarafı
O Verdadeiro Segredo da Misao Makimachi
Oihagi Shoujo: Makimachi Misao no Kakusareta Shoutai!
ความลับของสาวน้อยมิซาโอะ
追いはぎ少女・巻町操の隠された正体!

REGULAR.description:
When he and Misao come across a village terrorized by forces loyal to Shishio, Kenshin enlists Saito to help liberate it from the evil gang
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ubawareta Mura: Osoikakaru Shishio no Ma no Te!
หมู่บ้านที่ถูกทอดทิ้ง ญี่ปุ่นในอุดมคติของชิชิโอะ
奪われた村・襲いかかる志々雄の魔の手!

REGULAR.description:
Leaving Misao behind, Kenshin and Saito make their way inside Shishio`s fortress. Following a confrontation with one of his most powerful henchmen, Kenshin is ready to take on Shishio himself.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Across the Boundary Between Edo and Meiji
Bakumatsu no Toki o Koete! Taijishita Shishio to Kenshin
Edo ve Meiji Arasındaki Sınırın Ötesinde: Kenshin ve Shishio Karşı Karşıya!
Shishio e Kenshin Frente a Frente
การประจันหน้ากับชิชิโอ
幕末の時を超えて! 対峙した志々雄と剣心

REGULAR.description:
Following Kenshin`s defeat of the giant Senkaku, Shishio pits him against the young, emotionless assassin responsible for the Home Minister`s murder.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shougeki! Oreta Sakabatou: Tenken no Soujirou tai Kenshin
Şok! Ters Tarafı Keskin Kılıç Kırıldı: Sojiro`nun Ruhu ile Kenshin Karşılaşıyor
การประลองระหว่างเคนชินกับดาบสวรรค์เซอจิโร ดาบสลับคมหัก
衝撃! 折れた逆刃刀・天剣の宗次郎対剣心

REGULAR.description:
As Kaoru and Yahiko continue tracking Kenshin, Sanosuke encounters a fallen Buddhist monk who offers to teach him some powerful fighting techniques.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sanosuke, Gokui no Shugyou! Hakai Sou: Anji e no Chousen
Sanosuke`nin Gizli Eğitimi: Yok Edici Anji Sorunu
การฝึกพิเศษของซาโนะสุเกะ
左之助, 極意の修行! 破戒僧・安慈への挑戦

REGULAR.description:
As the showdown with Shishio approaches, Misao finds someone who could produce the sword Kenshin needs, only to be is disappointed when Shakkuu Arai refuses
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Última Espada de Gume Invertido
Sakabatou o Tsukutta Otoko: Arai Shakuu Saigo no Hitofuri!
Ters Tarafı Keskin Kılıcın Yaratıcısı: Shakku Arai`nin Son Hamlesi
The Creator of the Reverse Blade
ดาบเล่มสุดท้ายของอารายซักคูผู้สร้างดาบสลับคม
逆刃刀を作った男・新井赤空最後の一振り!

REGULAR.description:
After watching an unarmed Kenshin bravely defend himself, Shakkuu Arai`s only chance at saving his own son is to deliver his father`s final reverse edge sword.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Acımasız Bir Katil: Juppangatanalı Cho ile Ölesiye Bir Dövüş
Osorubeki Mujou no Shikaku! Juppongatana: Chou to no Shitou
เผชิญจุปปงคาตานะ โจ
恐るべき無情の刺客! 十本刀・張との死闘

REGULAR.description:
To prepare for Shishio, Kenshin asks a former teacher to help him master the last of his fighting techniques. However, Kenshin is distracted when Kaoru and Yahiko finally catch up with him after their long journey.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hiten Mitsurugi Ryuu no Ougi! Shishou Hiko Seijuurou to no Saikai
Hiten-Mitsurugi Stilinin Nihai Tekniği: Danışman Seijuro Hiko ile Buluşma
The Ultimate Technique of the Hiten Mitsurugi Style
ปรมจารย์เซย์จูโร่เพลงดาบล่องนภาขั้นสุดยอด
飛天御剣流の奥義! 師匠比古清十郎との再会

REGULAR.description:
Although Misao is excited by the return of her mentor and hero, she`s stunned to discover that Aoshi has betrayed one of their closest friends.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bir İttifak Kuruluyor: Aoshi ile Shishio`nun Bir Araya Geldiği Gün
Doumei Seiritsu: Aoshi ga Shishio to Te o Kunda Hi!
อาโอชิและชิชิโอะ
同盟成立・蒼紫が志々雄と手を組んだ日!

REGULAR.description:
As Kenshin struggles to learn, Sijuro teaches him the most secret of his fighting techniques. And though Kenshin doesn`t want to kill, it`s inevitable if he is to beat Shishio. Meanwhile, Sanosuke is arrested during his search for Samurai X.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sei to Shi no Hazama de! Ougi: Amakakeru Ryuu no Hirameki no Etoku
Ölüm ile Yaşam Arasında: Nihai Tekniğin Ustası!
อาโอชิและชิชิโอะ
生と死の間で! 奥義・天翔龍閃[あまかけるりゅうのひらめき]の会得

REGULAR.description:
While waiting in jail, Sanosuke learns of Shishio`s plan to overthrow the government by recruiting a deadly band of Samurai, including the blind warrior Usui, to defeat Kenshin and Saito
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Decisive Battle Like Violent Waters
Dotou no Kessen: Saikyou Shuudan Juppongatana Shuuketsu!
Sert Sulara Benzeyen Bir Savaş: En Güçlü Juppongatana Birliği
แผนร้ายของชิชิโอ
怒濤の決戦・最強集団十本刀集結!

REGULAR.description:
Reunited with Sanosuke, Kenshin lays plans to stop Shishio from burning Tokyo to create the confusion he needs to overthrow the government. But Shishio harbors a surprise with his newest weapon, an ironclad battleship hidden inside another
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tobu ga Gotoku! Senkan Rengoku Shukkou o Soshi seyo
หยุดเรือรบเรนโกกคุให้ได้
翔ぶが如く! 戦艦煉獄 出航を阻止せよ

REGULAR.description:
After Kenshin, Saito and Sanosuke destroy his battleship, Shishio issues his challenge for a final confrontation. And following Misao`s defeat of the blind Samurai, Usui, Kenshin vows to spare the life of her mentor, Aoshi.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Araf Alevler Altında: Makoto Shishio`nun Kaderi
Rengoku Enjou! Shishio Makoto no Meiun
ทะเลเพลิงบนเรนโกกคุ โชคชะตาของชิชิโอะ
煉獄炎上! 志々雄真実の命運

REGULAR.description:
As Shishio prepares for battle, a henchmen suggests a plan to weaken Kenshin and his forces, ridding them of any opposition once and for all. As the moment of truth draws near, Sanosuke is pitted against Anji.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Crash! The Lethal Punch, Futae no Kiwami
Gekitotsu! Futae no Kiwami: Unaru Sanosuke no Kobushi
Çarpışma! Öldürücül Yumruk, Futae no Kiwami: Sonasuke Çığlıklarının Yumruğu
ประทะพลังหม้ดซาโนสุเกะโลกมิรู้ลืม
激突! 二重[ふたえ]の極み・唸る佐之助の拳

REGULAR.description:
During his battle with Sanosuke, the fallen monk recalls how his hatred was born during an anti-Buddhist movement.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Guze e no Saisei: Anji no Aratanaru Shuppatsu
Kurtuluş İçin Yeniden Doğuş: Anji`nin Yeni Yaşamının Başlangıcı
อันจิคนใหม่กลับมาเพื่อกู้โลก
救世[ぐぜ]への再生・安慈の新たなる出発

REGULAR.description:
In his defeat of Usui, Saito exposes the blind warrior`s plot to kill Shishio. And while Kaoru, Yahiko and Misao are preparing to defend themselves from an ambush, Kenshin readies for his fight against Aoshi.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kurt, Kalbin Gözünü Yok Ediyor: Gatotsu`nun Vahşi Saldırısı
O Lobo Que Caçou os Olhos de Uma Alma
Shingan o Toraeta Ookami: Sakuretsu Suru Gatotsu Zero Shiki!
สุนัขจิ้งจองตาทิพย์ระเบิดพลังแรงแค้น
心眼をとらえた狼・炸裂する牙突零式!

REGULAR.description:
Kenshin sets out to honor his promises to both fight Aoshi and bring him back alive to Misao.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Söz Verilen Vakit Geldi: Aoshi ve Kenshin Yeniden Dövüşüyor
Yakusoku o Hatasu Toki: Aoshi to Kenshin no Saisen!
กลับมาทวงสัญญาศึกนี้ระหว่างเคนชินกับอาโอชิ
約束を果たす時・蒼紫と剣心の再戦!

REGULAR.description:
Following his defeat by Kenshin, Aoshi vows to renounce Shishio. And while Shishio looks for clues to help in his impending fight with Samurai X, Kaoru, Yahiko and Misao fight to stay alive.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mezameru Toki wa Ima: Manshin Soui no Kecchaku!
Uyan! Yaralarına Bakma ve Bitirmek İçin Savaş
ตาสว่างอีกครั้งจุดจบของนักสู้พันแผล
目醒める時は今・満身創痍の決着!

REGULAR.description:
After Yahiko`s fighting skills are stretched to the limit during his defeat of Shishio`s warrior, it`s now up to Kaoru to enter a battle of her own.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kiseki o Yobiokose! Aoiya no Koubou
มหัศจรรย์มีจริงที่สำนักอาโออิ
奇跡を呼び起こせ! 葵屋の攻防

REGULAR.description:
Despite the overwhelming odds, Kaoru, Yahiko and Misao continue to face warriors sent to eliminate them. But it`s the arrival of Kenshin`s teacher that turns the tide in their favor.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dev İle Süpermen Karşı Karşıya: Umutsuz Bir Anda Bir Ok Atışı Gibi
Kyojin tai Choujin: Zetsubou no Fuchi ni Hanatareta Isshi!
O Gigante e o Super Homem
คนใหญ่คนจริงกับวันอวสานที่กำลังมาถึง
巨人対超人・絶望の淵に放たれた一矢!

REGULAR.description:
As Sanosuke looks on, Kenshin goes to battle with Souijuro, the emotionless assassin responsible for breaking his sword. Though Shishio is confident of the young warrior`s ability, Kenshin may be able to win without having to resort to killing.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hiten tai Shukuchi! Soujirou Tenpu no Chikara
เทพเจ้าสายฟ้าแลบดาบสวรรค์โซจิโร
飛天対縮地! 宗次郎 天賦の能力[ちから]

REGULAR.description:
In an effort to explain Souijuro`s emotionless posture, Kenshin recalls how the young assassin was rescued from a life of slavery and then taught to fight by Shishio.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arashi no Yo no Sangeki: Soujirou no Kako
The Tragedy of a Stormy Night
โศกนาฏกรรมวันฝนตก
嵐の夜の惨劇・宗次郎の過去

REGULAR.description:
In the face of Kenshin`s probing questions, Souijuro`s concentration is broken. In defeat, the young assassin returns his prized sword to Shishio, warning him of the danger that lays ahead.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Duel With an Extreme Moment
Kyokugen no Shoubu! Shuntensatsu tai Amakakeru Ryuu no Hirameki
ดาบมังกรทะยานฟ้า
極限の勝負! 瞬天殺 対 天翔龍閃

REGULAR.description:
As Kaoru and Yahiko anxiously await his return, a wounded but determined Kenshin arrives for his final showdown with Shishio, who is unwilling to have anyone stand in his way of controlling Japan`s future.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bakumatsu o Kaketa Futari: Shishio tai Kenshin Saishuusen!
Os Sobreviventes do Final da Era Tokugawa
Two Men at the End of an Era
การต่อสู้ครั้งสุดท้ายของชิชิโอะและเคนชิน
幕末を駆けた二人・志々雄 対 剣心 最終戦!

REGULAR.description:
In their long awaited battle, Kenshin and Shishio compare ideologies as well as fighting techniques. But once Shishio uses gunpowder to gain the upper hand, it looks like Samurai X is doomed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jidai wa Shishio o Erabu no ka? Kenshin Saidai no Kiki!
Será Que Esta Era Escolheu Shishio?
โชคชะตาจะเลือกชิชิโอะอันตรายเคนชิน
時代は志々雄を選ぶのか? 剣心最大の危機!

REGULAR.description:
As Aoshi tries to stop a takeover of the country, Kenshin poses Shishio with his greatest challenge. In his defeat of Usui, Saito exposes the blind warrior`s plot to kill Shishio.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: อย่ายอมแพ้โชคชะตากลับมาเถอะเคนชิน
命運尽きず! 闘志, 今よみがえる

REGULAR.description:
Kenshin`s final effort to win the ultimate battle ends with Shishio destroying himself. But in the wake of Samurai X`s victory, Shishio`s closest aide vows revenge.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shouri o Yurusareshi Mono: Shishio tai Kenshin Shuumaku!
The Man who is Chosen for Victory
ปิดฉากการต่อสู้ชิชิโอะหรือเคนชินใครจะชนะ
勝利を許されし者・志々雄 対 剣心 終幕!

REGULAR.description:
Following Shishio`s defeat, his remaining allies put their fate in the hands of the government. While Kenshin is reunited with his Peace Force, the vanquished Shishio vows to take over Hell.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nokosareta Juppongatana: Ikite Yuku Tame no Sentaku
ทางเลือกของเหล่าดาบทั้งสิบที่เหลือ
残された十本刀・生きてゆくための選択

REGULAR.description:
As Kenshin is nursing the wounds sustained in his fight with Shishio, Kaoru prepares the Peace Force for their return home.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyouto... Kizamareta Kioku: Omoi o Haseta Shuppatsu
เกียวโตเมืองแห่งอดีตและความทรงจำ
京都... 刻まれた記憶・想いを馳せた出発

REGULAR.description:
Back at home, Kaoru works to restore the dilapidated dojo, while Kenshin encounters a wise old fisherman who teaches him an important lesson about love.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Negaibotaru no Densetsu: Aru Kenkaku o Machi Tsuzuketa Shoujo
เรื่องราวของหิงห้อยการต่อสู้ที่ยังไม่จบ
願い螢の伝説・ある剣客を待ち続けた少女

REGULAR.description:
After stepping in to stop what appears to be a robbery, Kenshin and Kaoru meet a young prince who looks exactly like Yahiko.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yahiko Ouji Tanjou? Karei Naru Shakoukai Debut
กำเนิดองชายยาฮิโกะสู่สังคมที่แตกต่าง
弥彦王子誕生? 華麗なる社交界でびゅー

REGULAR.description:
Sanosuke adopts a stray dog, unaware that it holds the key to a criminal gang`s plot to blackmail some local officials and gain political control. And when the gang finally tracks him down, Kenshin and Yahiko join Sanosuke to foil their plan.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A la recherche du trésor perdu !
Kieta Otakara o Sagase! Meitanteiken: Notarou
ตามล่าหาสมบัติของเจ้าโนทาโร่
消えたお宝を探せ! 名探偵犬・ノ太郎

REGULAR.description:
After Kenshin finds a ring inside a catfish, he`s persuaded to give it to Kaoru. Thinking it`s an engagement ring, Kaoru is sure that he`s asking her to get married.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaoru Mest Oldu: Kenshin`den Gelen Teklif?!
แหวนสื่อรักในวันทางาบาตะ
薫 感激 剣心のぷろぽーず!?

REGULAR.description:
Alerted by Misao, Kenshin and the rest of the Peace Force arrive to help Aoshi find a mysterious killer. Kenshin`s investigation uncovers evidence linking the killing to a Christian Samurai and of vengeance that`s been foretold.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kirameku Densetsu no Ken! Shinpi no Kenshi: Amakusa Shougo
La lame légendaire de Shiro Shougo
Quando o Dia se Transformar em Trevas
นักดาบในตำนานอะมาคุสะโชโง
煌めく伝説の剣! 神秘の剣士・天草翔伍

REGULAR.description:
In an effort to prevent more revenge killings, Kenshin must take on Shogo Amakusa, the Christian warrior known as God`s Child.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Unmei no Medallion: Sanosuke to Sayo no Deai
สร้อยคอแห่งการพบเจอ
運命のメダリオ・左之助と小夜の出会い

REGULAR.description:
As Kenshin prepares to honor his promise to stop Shogo Amakusa, he and Sanosuke uncover a secret church that was built when Christian worshipers were forced underground.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le champ de bataille de Shimabara
Taisen no Chi, Shimabara e! Shiyuu o Kessuru Toki
ชิมาบาระดินแดนศักดิ์สิทธิ์ของโชโง
対戦の地, 島原へ! 雌雄を決する時

REGULAR.description:
When neither Kaoru nor Kenshin can persuade Shogo Amakusa to abandon his plan to advance the Christian cause through violence, the stage for battle is set.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le choc de la Sen Rai Ryu
Rairyuusen no Shougeki! Yami ni Houmurareta Kenshin
ดิ่งสู่นรกที่เหมือนตายทั้งเป็น
雷龍閃の衝撃! 闇に葬られた剣心

REGULAR.description:
Though blinded by his duel with Shogo Amakusa, Kenshin seeks another battle in hopes it will restore his sight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaiou no Inbou: Wana ni Kakatta Shougo!
Uma Maneira de Estar na Vida
โชโงติดกับแผนร้ายของไคโอ
傀王の陰謀・罠にかかった翔伍!

REGULAR.description:
Along with the story of his parent`s martyrdom, Misao uncovers the truth behind the alleged miracles that deified Shogo Amarusa.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tsuioku no Hibi: Shougo to Sayo no Kanashiki Kako
ความหลังอันแสนเศร้าของสองพี่น้อง
追憶の日々・翔伍と小夜の哀しき過去

REGULAR.description:
Sir Kaioh unveils his plan to use Shogo Amarusa`s loyal followers to overthrow the government and control Japan himself.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Azawarau Akki! Shouzou, Bakuen ni Chitta Karyuu
มังกรเพลิงโชโงพิโรธสุดขั้ว
あざ笑う悪鬼! 庄三, 爆炎に散った火龍

REGULAR.description:
As Kenshin tries to stop the slaughter of the Christians as they march towards martyrdom, Sanosuke is unable to avert the death of Shogo`s terminally ill sister.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sanosuke no Namida: Futari ni Otozureta Towa no Wakare
น้ำตาแห่งการพลัดพรากชั่วนิรันดร์
左之助の涙・二人に訪れた永遠の別離

REGULAR.description:
As Misao and the Dutch consul ask the Army delay to their attack, the sightless Kenshin pressures Shogo to prevent the martyrdom of his followers.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Saigo no Seisen: Gekitotsu! Futatsu no Amakakeru Ryuu no Hirameki
ศึกตัดสินเพลงดาบล่องนภา
最後の聖戦・激突! ふたつの天翔龍閃

REGULAR.description:
Following Shogo`s surrender, Kenshin asks the government not to execute him. As a result, he and his followers are sent into exile in Holland.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tabidachi no Umi: Kibou wa Kanashimi no Nami o Koete
การเดินทางข้ามทะเลแห่งอดีต
旅立ちの海・希望は哀しみの波を越えて

REGULAR.description:
When the Peace Force comes across a man posing as Kenshin, everyone else wants the impostor exposed. But Kenshin notes that he`s been using his profits to care for a group of orphans.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shimonoseki ni Himura Doujou? Mou Hitori no Battousai Arawaru
บัตโตซัยกำมะลอ
下関に緋村道場? もう一人の抜刀斎現る

REGULAR.description:
When Kenshin accidentally loses all their money, the Peace Force must go to work at an inn in order to pay their bill.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gagakusei no Omou Hito: Hakone Yu no Machi Koi Soudou
ร้านประทับใจที่ฮาบารี
画学生の想う女性・箱根湯の街恋騒動!

REGULAR.description:
Kaoru offers to take on a scholarly young student who`s been expelled by his teacher until he learns how to fight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dois Homens Que Viveram no Final da Era Tokugawa
Katsu Kaishuu to Kenshin: Bakumatsu o Ikita Futari no Shukuen
勝海舟と剣心・幕末を生きた二人の宿縁

REGULAR.description:
As Kaoru continues her training of Daigoro, Kenshin is warned to steer clear of the young man`s teacher, Kaishu Katsu.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Owaranai Bakumatsu: Kaishuu ni Kaserareta Tenmei
終わらない幕末・海舟に課せられた天命

REGULAR.description:
Despite Kaishu`s determination to free his daughter on his own, Kenshin joins the Peace Force and Daigoro for a rescue.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Beniaoi no Sakubou: Kaishuu o Nerau Bakumatsu no Ikiryou!
紅葵の策謀・海舟を狙う幕末の生霊!

REGULAR.description:
Though Daigoro is wounded in the battle, Kenshin and company free Itsuko.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Katsu Kaishuu no Ketsui: Jidai o Koeta Shinjitsu
勝海舟の決意・時代を超えた真実

REGULAR.description:
With his arm nearly healed, Yutaro and his doctor arrive for a visit at the dojo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yutarou Kikoku: Kage ni Hisomu Kurokishidan no Yabou
由太郎帰国・影に潜む黒騎士団の野望

REGULAR.description:
When a letter from Dr. Hans reveals the story of the miraculous medicine, Yutaro joins the Peace Force in an effort to find it.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sanada Ninjagun to Reiyaku: Okashira Misanagi no Nerai
The Sanada Ninja Squad and the Elixir
真田忍群と霊薬・お頭御沙薙の狙い

REGULAR.description:
Using the clues left behind by Dr. Hans, Kenshin and company are led to the hidden shrine that holds the key to the miracle cure.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Meisou no Tabi: Shikumareta Omiwatari no Wana!
迷走の旅・仕組まれた御神渡りの罠!

REGULAR.description:
After surviving a fall into a volcano, the Peace Force comes across an injured Sanada Ninja who offers to help battle his former allies.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Heat Wave From Beneath the Earth
Chitei o Mau Akai Kagerou: Sakki! Sanada Sanninshuu
Dünyanın Altından Geen Bir Isı Dalgası
地底を舞う赤い陽炎・殺鬼! 真田三人衆

REGULAR.description:
After their search leads them to the hidden cure, the leader of the Black Knights makes it clear that he has no intention of honoring his promise to cede control of Japan to the Sanada Ninjas.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Schneider no Kake: Kurokishidan no Houkai!
シュナイダーの賭け・黒騎士団の崩壊!

REGULAR.description:
As he faces off against the Black Knight`s leader, Kenshin must rely on his brains and not his sword to win the battle.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Futatsu no Michishirube: Yahiko to Yutarou Towa no Yakusoku
Le serment de Yahiko et Yutarō
ふたつの道標・弥彦と由太郎永遠の約束

REGULAR.description:
As Aoshi arrives to bring her home, Misao joins Kaoru and some friends for a final shopping spree. However, Sanosuke and Yahiko`s efforts to keep an eye on the women lead to them to be mistaken for a pair of thieves
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: My Angel Misao e... Kyouto kara no Mukae
まいえんじぇる操へ... 京都からの迎え

REGULAR.description:
Following a series of accidents in town, a master of feng shui blames an imbalance in the Ki, a force which keeps all of nature`s other forces in balance
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fuusui no Kishuu! Harimegurasareta Gobousei no Nazo
風水の奇襲! 張り巡らされた五茫星の謎

REGULAR.description:
As Kenshin learns of a battle between the Wind and Water families for control of the Ki, efforts to build a railroad are exposed as a Water clan plot to control Japan
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ugomeku Fuusui no Maryoku: Nerawareta Kamiya Doujou!
うごめく風水の魔力・狙われた神谷道場!

REGULAR.description:
The Water family`s efforts to gain control of the Ki have left Kaoru seriously wounded.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaigenrei no Tokyo-fu! Bakushin Suru Kyouki no Ryuumyaku
戒厳令の東京府! ばく進する凶器の龍脈

REGULAR.description:
With help from the Wind family`s leader, Kenshin saves Kaoru`s life. But the Water family`s quest to redirect the Ki and gain control of Japan moves ahead as planned.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Teki wa Senjougahara ni Ari! Hisui no Monshou o Motomete
敵は戦場ヶ原にあり! 翡翠の紋章を求めて

REGULAR.description:
With Kenshin`s help, the Wind family derails their rival`s plan to redirect the flow of the Ki and ends their effort to dominate Japan
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaze to Mizu no Banka: Ima Koko ni Shiryoku Tsukusu!
The Elegy of Wind and Water
風と水の挽歌・今ここに死力尽くす!

SPECIAL.description:
In this episode, Kaoru and Yahiko were plushies. This special has two parts. In the first part of the special, they had a very basic summary of Kenshin (who he was and how he came to be in Tokyo with Kaoru and the gang).
In the second part of the special, "Himura Kenshin’s Greatest Hits" they show him using his Hiten Mitsurugi Ryuu moves on various opponents, though it doesn’t go into detail of how they work like the "Special Techniques" special.

titles.title: 夏休みスペシャル　京都決戦クライマックス！
Rurou no Saihate, Hi to Ruri no Kizuna wa Shiosai no Uchi ni
流浪の最果て・緋と瑠璃の絆は潮騒の中に
The First Chapter: The Tokyo Book
The Second Chapter: The Kyoto Book
Legendary Samurai! The man who fights for love.

OTHER: 7:るろうに剣心_-明治剣客浪漫譚-

titles.title: ซามูไรพเนจร
るろうに剣心 -明治剣客浪漫譚-
Rurouni Kenshin - Tales of the Meiji
Rurouni Kenshin: Romance of a Meiji Swordsman
